channel.title: Microsoft Fabric on Data Simplicity
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Fabric on Data Simplicity

item.title: Fabric Madness: Feature Engineering with pyspark
item.description: In part 2 of this series we dive deeper into the process of feature engineering.

item.title: Fabric Madness: predicting basketball games with Microsoft Fabric
item.description: In this series of posts titled Fabric Madness, we’re going to be diving deep into some of the most interesting features of Microsoft Fabric, for an end-to-end demonstration of how to train and use a machine learning model.
